data.name: Inder
data.intro: Senior Full Stack Developer with 12+ years of experience designing and scaling high-performance web applications. Expert in JS, Angular, React, Node.js, Java and Python, with a proven track record of delivering mission-critical solutions for industry giants including events.com, Cisco, and Lucid Motors.
data.description: Specialized in migrating large-scale datasets (2TB+), optimizing API architecture, and driving Agile adoption to increase team productivity by 30%.

educations.title: Bachelor of Science in IT (BSc IT)
educations.description: specializing in Information Technology, focusing on software engineering principles, database management, and network security.

educations.title: Diploma in Information Technology (DIT)
educations.description: Established a strong technical foundation in computer science fundamentals and application development.

experiences.title: Senior Full Stack Developer (Contract)
experiences.description:
Engagement with key clients: events.com, Cisco, Lucid Motors, Upped Events. 
• Architected a comprehensive event management ecosystem managing end-to-end ticket sales, staff coordination, and operational logistics. 
• Spearheaded the development of Cisco's award-winning "Master Boot Record (MBR)" application. 
• Engineered a global, multi-country Point of Sale (POS) system for Lucid Motors utilizing Ionic, Node.js, and React. 
• Led the zero-downtime migration of Canada's largest survey platform, transferring 2 TB of data from legacy SQL to a high-performance, indexed MySQL architecture on AWS. 
• Developed 'Motoview', a feature-rich car listing platform using Angular and Laravel.

experiences.title: Technical Lead
experiences.description:
Directed a team of developers in building scalable enterprise applications, instituting rigorous code review processes, and ensuring on-time delivery of critical milestones. 
• Championed Agile adoption, resulting in a measurable 30% increase in team productivity within six months. 
• Served as the primary technical liaison for clients, effectively translating complex business requirements into actionable technical specifications.

experiences.title: Senior Software Developer
experiences.description:
Collaborated closely with sales and executive leadership to define technical strategy and roadmaps for a diverse portfolio of applications. 
• Successfully delivered and maintained multiple customer-facing applications, ensuring high availability and performance. 
• Managed end-to-end User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and deployment pipelines to guarantee defect-free releases.

projects.name: Motoview
projects.description: Motoview is a premier digital showroom aggregation platform. We integrate with the Iceberg API to curate a diverse collection of vehicles from prestigious international motor shows. The platform empowers users with advanced comparison tools, social interaction features (likes/dislikes), and a robust commenting system, creating an engaging community for automotive enthusiasts.

projects.name: Ethnico
projects.description: Ethnico is a pioneering marketplace bridging the gap between traditional artisans and modern consumers. The platform unifies boutiques, clothing houses, and skilled artisans across Chennai, offering a seamless digital storefront for bespoke tailoring and readymade ethnic wear. It revolutionizes the local textile industry by bringing the complete boutique experience to the user's doorstep.

projects.name: Lex Chatbot
projects.description: An intelligent sentiment-analysis chatbot engineered for large-scale Canadian survey data. Leveraging AWS Lambda and Python, the bot dynamically adapts its questioning path based on real-time sentiment analysis of user responses. It features a sophisticated natural language processing script to ensure grammatical accuracy and syntax structure, enhancing user engagement and data quality.

projects.name: Delivery Papa
projects.description: A scalable multi-vendor food delivery and management ecosystem. The platform supports complex operations including individual vendor database management, multi-provider delivery dispatching with real-time tracking, table reservations, and POS integration. It features a gamified loyalty application that rewards user engagement with tier-based benefits, alongside a comprehensive marketing suite for vendor promotions.

projects.name: Upped Events
projects.description: An enterprise-grade event management platform orchestrating the entire event lifecycle. From ticketing and vendor onboarding to staff allocation and real-time operations, Upped provides a unified command center for organizers. Key features include secure ticket validation, merchandise management, and advanced analytics dashboards that provide actionable insights for data-driven decision-making.

projects.name: Gigipo
projects.description: An interactive ed-tech platform connecting expert mentors with students across disciplines like Arts and Music. The system integrates JITSI Meet for high-quality, secure video conferencing, enabling seamless virtual classrooms. Features include instant session booking, resource sharing, and a 'Gift a Class' functionality, streamlining the learning experience for a global audience.

services.title: Innovative Solutions
services.description: Transforming abstract concepts into tangible, high-impact digital realities through creative problem-solving and technical innovation.

services.title: Software Development
services.description: Architecting robust, scalable, and efficient codebases that solve complex user problems and streamline business operations.

services.title: Technical Mentorship
services.description: Passionate about fostering talent, I dedicate time to mentoring fellow developers, conducting code reviews, and elevating team capabilities.

services.title: Angular Expertise
services.description: Deep expertise since 2017, delivering enterprise-grade applications and contributing to the open-source community via NPM packages.

services.title: Node.js Architecture
services.description: Building high-performance backend systems since 2017, with extensive experience in Express.js and Hapi.js for scalable microservices.

services.title: React Ecosystem
services.description: Developing dynamic, responsive, and user-centric frontend interfaces since 2018, specializing in modern React patterns and performance.
